args_list.encoding: FastEncoding or Sequence[FastEncoding] or None = None

description: Holds the output of the [PretrainedTokenizerBase.__call__],[PretrainedTokenizerBase.encode_plus] and[PretrainedTokenizerBase.batch_encode_plus] methods (tokens, attention_masks, etc).

params.name: data
params.description: Dictionary of lists/arrays/tensors returned by the __call__/encode/batch_encode methods(input_ids, attention_mask, etc.).

params.name: tensor_type
params.description: You can give a tensor_type here to convert the lists of integers in Paddle/Numpy Tensors atinitialization.

params.name: prepend_batch_axis
params.description: Whether or not to add a batch axis when converting to tensors (see tensor_type above).
